duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the relationships with 3PLs, 3rd party warehouse & hub, truck company, including weekly and monthly reviews and day-to-day escalations.
Seek, plan, and execute all fulfillment & logistics operations, including preparing for peak.
Assist the sellers on the platform to optimize the standard and timely delivery process.
Communicate SOPs and manage against internal and external KPIs (involve 3rd party warehouse & hub).
Optimize logistics solution to ensure lowest-cost shipping opportunities and provide highest rates of on-time delivery for customers (local sellers’ orders).
Assist oversea logistics team optimize the import process and handle some daily customs clearance exceptions (cross-border sellers’ orders).
Develop alternative fulfillment solutions to handle store fulfillment orders in a cost-effective manner.
Ensure all policies and procedures necessary for adequate inventory control are in place and followed.
Audit reports & invoices to ensure accuracy.
Team set-up & People management of logistics local team.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree from Top 50 Business School in US (Preferred)

More than 3 years 3PL management work experiences in top E-commerce Logistics company or more than 3 years work experiences in top logistics company (+has project experiences with E-commerce clients) (Required)
Fluent oral and written communication in English (Required)
